data.message: Help!!! My facebook translation changed automatically on me      I need someone to help me to fix the English back

replies.message: Hi Christie. Please follow these steps to change your language settings: http://bit.ly/1pUyrK9 . -Nancy
I'm really in deep desperation for u yo to finf e fe
I'm able to see why u was socoldn I.

My FB also changed from English to French, but clicking on the above link, to correct this problem, I get " Comment modifier les paramètres de langue ?

Pour modifier la langue d’affichage de Facebook :

Cliquez sur  en haut à droite et sélectionnez Paramètres.
Cliquez sur Langue.
Sélectionnez la langue que vous souhaitez lire sur Facebook et cliquez sur Enregistrer les modifications.". I don't read French.  Can you copy the English instructions and paste them here and as a private message to me?
Toi khong lam duoc huong Dan cho toi
Toi lam dung ma say cho nao cho toi biet
